content: Luck can certainly play a role in a team's success in the MLS Cup, as in any sport. There might be instances where a missed call or a fortuitous bounce of the ball can have a significant effect on the outcome of a match. However, success in top-level sport is more often than not the result of the more tangible factors, such as a team's skill, strategy, and execution. While unexpected events can happen and change the course of a match, the teams that perform consistently at a high level throughout the season and in the playoffs are likely to achieve greater success.
